attacks.name: Incinerate
attacks.effect: Show the top card of your opponent's deck to all players. If it's a Trainer card, discard it.

attacks.name: Rushing Magma
attacks.effect: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. (If there are fewer than 5 cards in your deck, discard all of them.) This attack does 20 damage for each Energy card you discarded in this way.
